description:
11.241 spp
Apply a simple postprocessing filter that compresses and decompresses the image
at several (or - in the case of quality level 6 - all) shifts
and average the results.

The filter accepts the following options:

mode.description: Set thresholding mode. Available modes are: 'hard' (default) and 'soft'.

qp.description: Force a constant quantization parameter. If not set, the filter will use the QP from the video stream (if available).

quality.description: Set quality. This option defines the number of levels for averaging. It accepts an integer in the range 0-6. If set to 0, the filter will have no effect. A value of 6 means the higher quality. For each increment of that value the speed drops by a factor of approximately 2.

use_bframe_qp.description: Enable the use of the QP from the B-Frames if set to 1. Using this option may cause flicker since the B-Frames have often larger QP. Default is 0 (not enabled).
